attributes.action: to not interfere with laos criminal justice
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Samantha Orobator is accused of smuggling 680g of heroin into Laos. Under Laotian law, execution is mandatory for over 500g. Samantha is 20 years old, pregnant, British, has been tried as per the laos justice system. She has been found guilty. We ask the Prime Minister, quite simply, not to interfear with the laos internal policy and, do not attempt to secure her safe return to the UK).

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
